DC CODE § 10-1332

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: There is established in the District of Columbia the John A. Wilson Building Foundation ("Foundation"), a private-public nonprofit corporation.
The purposes of the Foundation are:
To develop a long-range plan for the use of the Wilson Building by the District government and by the public; and
To develop and implement a fundraising plan to pay for the renovation and restoration of the Wilson Building.

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Establishment of the Wilson Building Foundation.
